content.question: Which of the following can most accurately be concluded about the broader economic conditions of the period described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Businesses made use of new management structures to increase the production of goods.
Agricultural production continued to be the primary economic activity in the South.
The economic gap between the social classes narrowed as standards of living improved.
Large-scale industrial production was accompanied by anticapitalist government policies.

content.answer: Businesses made use of new management structures to increase the production of goods.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
